title: France panorama. [No. 69/30]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The Aerotrain - after trials at more than 400 kph the full-size Aerotrain is nearing completion. It will go into service between Paris and Orleans. 2. Beginning of a 7-year term: Presiden Pompidou receives the diplomatic corps at the Elysees Palace. The President’s first press conference. July 14th Bastille Day. 3. The concervatory contests - at the Theatre de Paris and the Salle Gaveau. 4. Omnipresent Napoleon - the numerous exhibitions retracing the life of the Emperor. 5. Car rodeos - stuntmen on wheels.
